954960.name: Jam Studio VR - Music Appreciation Series
954960.description:
This DLC includes the following interactive learning songs that demonstrate different music genres and provide a variety of historical and interesting information about each of these music styles. These songs are great for anyone, at any age, that wants to learn about music genres.

Music Appreciation - Classical
Music Appreciation - Country
Music Appreciation - DJ
Music Appreciation - Hip Hop
Music Appreciation - Jazz
954960.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
